name: Peter Rabbit Run!
description:
Peter Rabbit and his friends are on the run! Join the mischievous bunch on their adventure around the country!


RUN WILD!
Dodge, weave, and bounce your way through exciting areas like Mr. McGregor’s Garden!


COLLECT THOSE TOMATOES!
You are away from home and you are hungry! So collect as many tomatoes as you can. They will improve your score and help you upgrade your power ups!


USE POWER UPS!
Spice up your run by using up to 5 power-ups including Toy Trucks, Balloons, High Tops, Jelly Beans, and Magnets.


UNLOCK YOUR FAVORITE CHARACTERS!
Collect jigsaw puzzle pieces to unlock and play as Peter, Benjamin, Flopsy, Mopsy, or Cotton-Tail.


RESCUE YOUR PET FRIENDS!
The villainous Piperson’s Pets have captured your friends! Collect cages to release your fellow critters.


COMPETE ONLINE!
You can earn further rewards by competing online in contests against other players with our PVP feature, and by climbing leaderboards in weekly challenge events.


If you love the movie Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway and endless runner games, you will surely want to play Peter Rabbit Run!
